casebody.data:
LAFOURCHE REALTY COMPANY, INC. and The Allan Company
v.
ENTERGY LOUISIANA, INC., Entergy Louisiana Holdings, Inc., Entergy Services, Inc., Irby Construction Company, Irby Construction Company of Mississippi, Highlines Construction Company, Inc., and Frogco, Inc. NO. 2018-C-1516 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 8, 2019 Denied. WEIMER, J., recused.

HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
